description: Plays the song you specified either with a link or the name of the song
Clears the server queue and disconnects the bot from the voice channel
Skips to the next song in the server song queue
Skips you to the specified position in the queue
Displays the server song queue
Pauses the current song playing in the voice channel
Unpauses the current song playing in the voice channel
Removes the song which is in the specified queue position
Displays information about the song that is currently playing
Loops the current song playing until Sierra is disconnected or the loop is disabled
Loops the server queue
Searches YouTube for a track with the corresponding name
Searches YouTube for a playlist with the corresponding name
Searches SoundCloud for a track with the corresponding name
Searches SoundCloud for a playlist with the corresponding name
Searches Spotify for a track with the corresponding name
Searches Spotify for a playlist with the corresponding name
Shuffles the music queue randomizing what song comes up next
Clears the queue of all songs
Allows you to adjust the volume of the music
Searches Spotify, SoundCloud and YouTube and provides you with links
Gets the lyrics to the song that's currently playing
Goes to the beginning of the song that's currently playing
Allows you to go back to songs that you have already played
Creates a user specific playlist
Deletes a users playlist
Renames a playlist to the new specified name
Allows you to view your playlists
Adds the songs from a users playlist to the server queue
Adds the current song your listening to, to the playlist specified
Removes the song from the specified position
